critique: The document is an approval of a code of fair competition for the Plumbago Crucible Industry. The tone is formal and legalistic. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is a sense of confidence and stability in the economy. There is a sense of joy that the industry is complying with the National Industrial Recovery Act. There is no indication of sadness, anger, fear, or disgust. There might be a slight surprise that the application was made in full compliance.
